description: TBS Rates of Pay - federal public service pay scales by occupational group, level, and step

step.description: Pay step within level (typically 1-10, some up to 19)

effective_date.description: Date pay rate became effective (YYYY-MM-DD format)

is_represented.description: True if unionized/represented, False if excluded/unrepresented

collective_agreement.description: Collective agreement name if represented (null for excluded)

notes: Pay rates are for excluded/unrepresented employees in the core public administration
Step progression varies by occupational group (1-10 typical, some up to 19)
Annual rates range from ~$36k to ~$196k CAD
Effective dates reflect Treasury Board pay adjustments
